titleStmt.title: Mr. Rowse his speech made in the lower House of Parliament the thirtieth of December, 1641 in opposition of the making of Doctor Winniff, Doctor Holsworth, Doctor King, bishops, lately elected by His Majesty, till a setled government in religion be established in this kingdome.
Speech made in the Lower House of Parliament the thirtieth of December 1641, in opposition of the making of Doctor Winniff, Doctor Holsworth, Doctor King bishops
titleStmt.author: Rous, Francis, 1579-1659.
